label: A8B24C_cP33_221_g_efh_a-001
title: Ce$_{8}$Pd$_{24}$Sb Structure
comments: CePd$_{3}$ forms in the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_cP4_221_a_c-001}{$L1_{2}$ Cu$_{3}$Au Structure}.  Adding antimony at some octahedral sites gives this structure.  Alternatively, this can be viewed as a \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_cP5_221_a_c_b-001}{cubic perovskite ($E2_{1}$) structure} with 7/8 of the B atoms removed in an ordered manner.
